title: Bought 2 Pixel 5 cant figure how to get notifications to show all the content on lockscreEn?
content:
When a message text, tweet, fb post, IG post comes in it just shows something came in but not message flashes on lock screen? Have it set to show all content vs keeping hidden.

Coming from iPhone 12s where the whole message shows for 15 sec then disappears...
Any ideas?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
